name: Pingsta

overview:
Pingsta is a collaborative platform for the worldâ€™s Internet experts. Pingsta - whose members include inventors, fellows, professors, distinguished engineers and technical leaders in over 50 countries - facilitates intellectual collaboration amongst the experts that invented and continue to sustain the various components that make up the Internet.

Through its Intellectual Commerce Ecosystem - Pingsta ICEâ„¢ - service offering, Pingsta enables Enterprises, IT Service Providers and Government agencies worldwide to leverage Network-Expertise-in-the-Cloudâ„¢ on a pay-per-use basis for break-fix technical support, consulting and R&D tasks while also enabling them to monetize the excess capacity of their current in-house global workforce.

Pingsta ICE comes in three editions:

-Service Provider

-Enterprise

-Pro
